Author: gardenfaiiri
Text: That’s an excellent idea, definitely thinking of investing in a few oversized sweaters, especially since I’m freezing all of the time. I’ll have to take myself out thrifting sometime in the next couple of weeks. Thank you so much for your suggestions

Author: bbtvvz
Text: I feel you. Going through the same thing right now. I own old clothes that fit at my current size, I just can't stand the idea of being on display like that.   My workaround has been leggings + oversized cardigan. And a bulky scarf. That hides everything down to the knees while using existing pieces of clothing.   If you can muster up the energy to go thrifting, cardigans and roomy sweaters should be easy to find.
